text.title: Get Away With Going to a Site You Aren't Supposed To

head.s: Get Away With Going to a Site You Are n't Supposed To

p.s: Are you not allowed to go on a website , say , YouTube or Myspace ?
Well , for whatever reason it may be , you want to go on that site .
Maybe a friend told you of a cool video on YouTube , or maybe your friend has a page on Myspace they want you to see .
Either way , its important you make sure you do n't get caught doing this .
Someone could see you on the site , or they could tell you were there from the browser 's history .
Please read on to find out how to cover your tracks when you have to go on a site you are n't allowed to visit .

item.s:
Open up your browser and
go to the history
.
Make sure there is some history left behind you before you go to the site .
If there is n't much , go to some sites , like yahoo and just click on links to fill up the history .

figure.rend: Get Away With Going to a Site You Aren't Supposed To Step 1.jpg

item.s: Once you have some history built , go to the site you are n't allowed to .
The point of filling up history before is because the site you went to will get " blurred in " and " lost " with the other pages .

figure.rend: Get Away With Going to a Site You Aren't Supposed To Step 2.jpg

item.s: You should also get a few other windows opened up .
This way , if someone comes by , you can just change windows .
Look at whatever you need to look at .
Be sure you do n't take long though .

figure.rend: Get Away With Going to a Site You Aren't Supposed To Step 3.jpg

item.s: Close the window .
You should do this just to be sure you do n't get caught .
This is also where having multiple windows open helps , as you can now fill up more history .

figure.rend: Get Away With Going to a Site You Aren't Supposed To Step 4.jpg

item.s: on that site .
You can now begin filling up history again .

figure.rend: Get Away With Going to a Site You Aren't Supposed To Step 5.jpg

item.s: Go on another site your parents allow you to .
Once you are there , go back and forth and click on as many links as you can .
Do this quickly however so it looks like you were only there for the whole time .

figure.rend: Get Away With Going to a Site You Aren't Supposed To Step 6.jpg

item.s: Try getting Firefox then go to Tools > Options ... > Privacy and check the box " Always clear private data when I close Firefox " then go to settings and check/uncheck whatever you want to be erased or kept .

p.s: Do n't use AOL 9.0 you ca n't delete the web history .

item.s:
and
make up some excuses
for what you are doing .
Also delete the temporary internet files and cookies .
If there is a web filter on your computer , use a proxy web surfer to surf the sites , and then delete the history afterwards .
Try downloading an internet explorer that has a porn mode were you can delete history easily
Search the website 's name on Google instead of entering it into the address bar .
If you do , the bad website 's name will be in the address bar and your parent[s ] will notice .
Be sure to delete the Google search history too .
If you would like to bookmark a website add it to you favorites with an innocent looking name .
For example " This History of the Airplane Telephone " .
You could get grounded if you do this .
Please do this at your own risk .
Internet browser
Internet history
A few windows open
Proxy web surfer ( such as Proxify.com or vtunnel.com )
